tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE claim_history (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INTEGER REFERENCES claims(claim_id),
  status_change_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  previous_status VARCHAR(50),
  new_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ClaimDetails (
  claim_id INT,
  claimant_id INT,
  claim_status VARCHAR(50),
  claim_resolution_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (claim_id, claimant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES Claims(claim_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (claimant_id) REFERENCES Claimants(claimant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claimants (
	claimant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	claimant_name VARCHAR,
	claimant_address VARCHAR,
	claim_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES claims_info(claim_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
	payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	payment_date DATE,
	payment_amount DECIMAL,
	claim_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES claims_info(claim_id)
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
	resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	resolution_date DATE,
	resolution_details TEXT,
	claim_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES claims_info(claim_id)
);
